test.name: TC_WS-012 Should be able to search for product and confirm that the product is found

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (123.0.6312.122) detected in PATH at C:\bin\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (124.0.6367.61); currently, chromedriver 124.0.6367.60 is recommended for chrome 124.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Search for product and confirm that the product is found
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Hummingbird t-shirt' into text field 'name=s'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//a[contains(text(),'Hummingbird printed t-shirt')]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//span[@class='price' and contains(text(), '28.92')]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//img[@alt='Hummingbird printed t-shirt']'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.doc: Search for product and confirm that the product is found

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (123.0.6312.122) detected in PATH at C:\bin\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (124.0.6367.61); currently, chromedriver 124.0.6367.60 is recommended for chrome 124.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
